title: Jagged Salvation
description: Two souls collide in a twisted dance of obsession and desire.Zale Griffin, haunted by a relentless stalker who has already taken everything from her, finds herself once again trapped in his sinister web. But when Isak Hardin, a powerful billionaire with a penchant for treating women as disposable, enters her life, the lines between salvation and damnation blur.As Zale and Isak become entangled in a dangerous game of possession and dominance, their worlds collide in a battle of wills, fueled by their shared scars and a fiery attraction that defies reason. In a city where trust is scarce and secrets breed like wildfire, they find solace in each other's arms, their connection both tender and volatile.Yet, as Zale's stalker closes in, they must confront their deepest fears and make unimaginable sacrifices to protect what they hold dear. Will they find redemption in the face of relentless darkness, or will their jagged salvation come at a devastating cost?
author: Cadyn James
